lead_paragraph: Jordan's King Abdullah says his country needs long-term aid from the international community to cope with a huge influx of Syrian refugees, warning that unless it received support the "dam is going to burst".

headline.main: Jordan Needs International Help Over Refugee Crisis: King Abdullah
headline.print_headline: Jordan Needs International Help Over Refugee Crisis: King Abdullah

snippet: Jordan's King Abdullah says his country needs long-term aid from the international community to cope with a huge influx of Syrian refugees, warning that unless it received support the "dam is going to burst"....
